T02D3493:148a-1: ts'i na kra ma a'arya t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3493:148b-0: rgya nag rim pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i @148b sgrub thabs /
T02D3493:148b-1: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3493:148b-2: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir stong pa nyid
T02D3493:148b-3: du bsgoms nas a'a:yig dmar po las skyes pa'i padma
T02D3493:148b-4: dmar po'i steng du t'am yig dkar po las skyes
T02D3493:148b-5: pa'i padma'i snod ces pa thod pa'i snod du nyi
T02D3493:148b-6: ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig nag po las skyes
T02D3493:148b-7: pa'i sa bon dang bcas pa'i gri gug bsam /
T02D3493:148b-8: gri gug yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun ma
T02D3493:148b-9: 'phags ma sgrol ma sku mdog nag mo zhal gcig
T02D3493:148b-14: zhabs g-yon brkyang gis ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3493:148b-15: klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3493:148b-16: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can /
T02D3493:148b-17: mgo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba dang ldan pa /
T02D3493:148b-18: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3493:148b-19: ral gri dang gri gug g-yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa /
T02D3493:148b-20: autpa la dang thod pa g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa /
T02D3493:148b-21: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan cing ral pa kham pa'i thor tshags can /
T02D3493:148b-22: mi bzad pa'i gad rgyangs can shin tu 'jigs pa'i skur bskyed nas /
T02D3493:148b-23: aom hr'i: h'um phat ces pa'i sngags shes rab lhag par gsal bar byed pas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3493:148b-24: mkhas pas ral gri'i gnas su ni //
T02D3493:148b-25: mi yi rus pa'i phreng ba bsam //
T02D3493:148b-26: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3493:148b-27: sngags mchog yang dag bzlas par bya ;
